actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Oversight and Courts.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Oversight and the Courts

official_title: A bill for the relief of Retired Sergeant First Class James D. Benoit, Wan Sook Benoit, and the estate of David Benoit, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Grants the United States Court of Federal Claims jurisdiction to hear, determine, and render judgment on a claim by two named persons or by an individual's estate concerning his death.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Retired Sergeant First Class James D. Benoit, Wan Sook Benoit, and the estate of David Benoit, and for other purposes.
